Name: Breakfast Sandwich
Description: A hot sandwich piled with eggs, melted cheese, and nice, crispy bacon.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Un sándwich caliente con huevo, queso derretido y tocino crujiente.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 계란, 녹은 치즈, 싱싱하고 바삭한 베이컨이 들어간 핫 샌드위치.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein heißes Sandwich mit Eiern, geschmolzenem Käse und schönem, knusprigem Speck.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un sandwich chaud plein d'œufs, de fromage fondu et d'un beau et croustillant bacon.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy melegszendvics tojással, olvadt sajttal és ízletes, ropogós baconnel töltve.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Um sanduíche quente empilhado com ovos, queijo derretido, e bacon agradável e crocante.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 早餐三明治。一份热三明治，里面有鸡蛋、融化的奶酪和香脆的培根。
